# CFLocaleGetLanguageLineDirection(_:)

**Function**

Returns the line direction for the specified ISO language code.

## Declaration

```swift
func CFLocaleGetLanguageLineDirection(_ isoLangCode: CFString!) -> CFLocaleLanguageDirection
```

## Parameters

- **isoLangCode**: The ISO language code.

## Return Value

The line direction for the language. See [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFLocaleLanguageDirection] for possible values. If the appropriate direction can’t be determined, [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFLocaleLanguageDirection/unknown] is returned.

## Getting Line and Character Direction for a Language

- **CFLocaleGetLanguageCharacterDirection(_:)**: Returns the character direction for the specified ISO language code.
